Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute near 26th/Karlov
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th rrtd EB via Cicero, Cermak, Pulaski & 26th; WB via 26th, Pulaski, Cermak, Kostner, 16th, Cicero & 26th due to police actvty nr 26th/Karlov

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my route?

#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near 26th/Karlov.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Cicero, Cermak, Pulaski, then resume their normal route on 26th.
  • Westbound buses will operate via 26th, Pulaski, Cermak, Kostner, 16th, Cicero, then resume their normal route on 26th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at Kedzie.
Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near Rhodes/68th
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st  buses temp. rerouted EB: 69th, State and 67th; WB: 67th, State and 69th: due to, street blockage near Rhodes/68th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Rhodes/68th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 69th, State and 67th.

Westbound buses will operate via 67th, State and 69th.

Allow extra travel time.
